text: @KirstieMAllsopp @BBCNewsnight Why does @Channel4 employ someone who spreads dangerous lies? Nobody knows how infectious kids are & there is a new illness in children they think is related to Covid. @Channel4News should investigate the impact of celebrity Covid truthers like Kirstie. https://t.co/Ex6mCewfsq
